mil3.1.4:1.2_0: “paṇḍito kho ayaṁ bhikkhu paṭibalo mayā saddhiṁ sallapituṁ,
mil3.1.4:1.2_1: bahukāni ca me ṭhānāni pucchitabbāni bhavissanti,
mil3.1.4:2.2_2: bhadantassa āroceyyāsi ‘sve antepure raññā saddhiṁ sallāpo bhavissatī’”ti.
mil3.1.4:2.3_0: Idaṁ vatvā milindo rājā uṭṭhāyāsanā theraṁ nāgasenaṁ āpucchitvā rathaṁ abhirūhitvā “nāgaseno nāgaseno”ti sajjhāyaṁ karonto pakkāmi.
mil3.1.4:3.1_0: Atha kho devamantiyo āyasmantaṁ nāgasenaṁ etadavoca—
mil3.1.4:3.5_0: Atha kho tassā rattiyā accayena devamantiyo ca anantakāyo ca maṅkuro ca sabbadinno ca yena milindo rājā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu,
mil3.1.4:3.9_0: “Yattake bhikkhū icchati, tattakehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ āgacchatū”ti.
mil3.1.4:4.4_0: “yattake bhikkhū icchati, tattakehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ āgacchatū”ti.
mil3.1.4:4.8_0: “yattake bhikkhū icchati, tattakehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ āgacchatū”ti.
mil3.1.4:4.12_0: Ayaṁ bhaṇe sabbadinno aññathā bhaṇati, kiṁ nu mayaṁ nappaṭibalā bhikkhūnaṁ bhojanaṁ dātun”ti?
mil3.1.4:5.1_0: Atha kho devamantiyo ca anantakāyo ca maṅkuro ca yenāyasmā nāgaseno tenupasaṅkamiṁsu,
mil3.1.4:5.3_0: ‘yattake bhikkhū icchati, tattakehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ āgacchatū’”ti.
mil3.1.4:5.4_0: Atha kho āyasmā nāgaseno pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya asītiyā bhikkhusahassehi saddhiṁ sāgalaṁ pāvisi.
mil3.1.4:6.1_0: Atha kho anantakāyo āyasmantaṁ nāgasenaṁ nissāya gacchanto āyasmantaṁ nāgasenaṁ etadavoca—
mil3.1.4:6.2_0: “bhante nāgasena, yaṁ panetaṁ brūsi ‘nāgaseno’ti, katamo ettha nāgaseno”ti?
mil3.1.4:6.5_0: “Yo so, bhante, abbhantare vāto jīvo pavisati ca nikkhamati ca, so ‘nāgaseno’ti maññāmī”ti.
mil3.1.4:6.6_0: “Yadi paneso vāto nikkhamitvā nappaviseyya, pavisitvā na nikkhameyya, jīveyya nu kho so puriso”ti?
mil3.1.4:6.8_0: “Ye panime saṅkhadhamakā saṅkhaṁ dhamenti, tesaṁ vāto puna pavisatī”ti?
mil3.1.4:6.10_0: “Ye panime vaṁsadhamakā vaṁsaṁ dhamenti, tesaṁ vāto puna pavisatī”ti?
mil3.1.4:6.12_0: “Ye panime siṅgadhamakā siṅgaṁ dhamenti, tesaṁ vāto puna pavisatī”ti?
mil3.1.4:6.15_0: “Nāhaṁ paṭibalo tayā vādinā saddhiṁ sallapituṁ, sādhu, bhante, atthaṁ jappehī”ti.
mil3.1.4:6.16_0: “Neso jīvo, assāsapassāsā nāmete kāyasaṅkhārā”ti thero abhidhammakathaṁ kathesi.
